scripts.build: concurrently "npm run minify:css" "npm run minify:js" "npm run minify:images" "npm run minify:html" "npm run minify:clients" "npm run minify:overrides"
scripts.minify:overrides: for d in clients/*; do postcss "${d}/client.css" --output "dist/$(echo $d | cut -d '/' -f2 -)/client.min.css"; done
scripts.minify:js: terser --compress --output dist/assets/main.min.js -- assets/js/accord.js assets/js/parameters.js assets/js/polyfill.js assets/js/translation.js
scripts.minify:clients: for d in clients/*; do mkdir -p "dist/$(echo $d | cut -d'/' -f2 -)" && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype "${d}/index.html" -o "dist/$(echo $d | cut -d'/' -f2 -)/index.html" ; done
